DOC.brief_summary: For post-Cesarean analgesia , investigator compare efficacy single-shot epidural preservative free morphine continuous epidural fentanyl infusion . The investigator compare patient 's pain level satisfaction two technique , well side effect patient experience , itching , nausea , back pain respiratory depression .
DOC.brief_title: Epidural Morphine Versus Epidural Fentanyl Infusion Following Cesarean Section
DOC.detailed_description: Included study healthy ( ASA I II ) woman elective Cesarean section candidate regional anesthesia . Exclusion criterion include morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 ) , age le 18 year , history sleep apnea , abuse intolerance opioid analgesic . All patient also receive 100 microgram fentanyl epidurally Cesarean section , receive ibuprofen every six hour first 24 hour Cesarean section . The patient visited twice day postoperatively two day . The epidural morphine expect last approximately 20 hour , fentanyl infusion keep place two day procedure . Additional analgesic , intravenous morphine PO oxycodone tylenol , available breakthrough pain .
DOC.criteria: Patients elective Cesarean section Healthy woman ( ASA I II ) Regional anesthesia candidate Morbid obesity ( BMI > 40 ) Sleep apnea Age 18 Intolerance addiction opioids
DOC.keyword: fentanyl , morphine , duramorph , Cesarean section , epidural
